config.site_desc: A demo project to show how to generate living documentation with Behave and Odoo.

tags.name: task_management_create_task
tags.title: Creating tasks
tags.desc: Creating a task helps to get work done and makes it easier to see what people are doing.
tags.long_desc:
Task creation in Odoo is super easy. Here's some advantages:

  • Track time spent on project
  • Set deadlines
  • Assign a reviewer

tags.name: create_task_user
tags.title: Creating tasks for users
tags.desc: Tasks are made more powerful with user intergration
tags.long_desc: Take advantage of Odoo's built in user model and assign users to assign and review tasks you create.

tags.name: create_task_deadline
tags.title: Creating tasks for a deadline
tags.desc: Important tasks are made more important with deadlines
tags.long_desc: Show the importance of a task by setting a deadline, priority and moving it to a stage in your project straight away.
